choices: Destin8 (this is also known as FCP or MCP)

fields.label: What is a CSP?
fields.infoText: CHIEF connects with 5 Community System Providers (CSPs). These are independent trade systems that directly serve hundreds of carriers, transit sheds and freight forwarders. CSPs record and track the movement of goods within ports, enabling them to operate more efficiently. that allows you to make declarations in CHIEF and can be obtained from a community system provider (CSP)
